structure.unit: STATE AND REGIONAL MENTAL HEALTH PROGRAMS

law.history: Repealed 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 247, sec. 21, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 202, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(1), (8), (9) and (21). -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 278, sec. 3.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Purchasing treatment for patients - Recovery of charges.
